application-template.name: GenerateRecodeMap
application-template.description: This application updates the metadata file from the user provided input data file. By default, if there is any categorical attribute in the input data file, the application will generate a recode map file, whose file name will be the same as the input data file, with suffix "map.json". ".

property.description: Whether the application should generate a recode map for categorical (nominal or ordinal) attributes? If the data is already recoded, then choose "No". Otherwise, by choosing "Yes", the application will generate a recode map for all categorical attributes in the data file. The user then should use Recode app to generate a recoded data file.
property.label: Generate recode map for nominal attributes?
property.name: recode
